ja463:7.1: aggīva suriyova → aggi suriyo ca (sya1ed, sya2ed) | aggīva sūriyo (mr)
ja463:9.1: dadhīva khīraṃva → dadhiṃva khīraṃva (bj) | dadhi ca khīrañca (sya1ed, sya2ed) | dadhiṃ va khīraṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja463:16.4: baḷavāmukhīti → vaḷavāmukhīti (bj) | balavāmukhīti (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | vaḷabhāmukhīti (pts-vp-pli1ed)
